oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Belmont Baptist Church, between 1906 and 1921
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Belmont Baptist Church located on the corner of 12th Avenue South and Beechwood Avenue. Two men stand outside of the entrance. The church was built in 1906 as Belmont Baptist Church. In 1921 the church was sold and became Waverly Belmont Church of Christ. In 1975 the building property was purchased by another entity and has had various uses over time. Forms part of the Nashville Room Historic Photographs Collection. 1 photograph : b & w ; 8 x 10 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Belmont Baptist Church (Nashville, Tenn.)
